title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.31 - Petition; withdrawal or amendment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.31 - Petition; withdrawal or amendment

State Regulations

At any time before the assignment of a petition for
certification to a hearing officer, the director of PEPR may permit the
amendment of the petition or its withdrawal in whole or in part. At any time
after the assignment, the hearing officer, upon motion, may permit withdrawal
of the petition in whole or in part, and the hearing officer may permit
amendment thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.31

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
